original_text: Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard carried into exile to Babylon the people who remained in the city, along with those who had gone over to him, and the rest of the people.
korean_text: 사령관 느부사라단이 성중에 남아 있는 백성과 자기에게 항복한 자와 그 외의 남은 백성을 잡아 바벨론으로 옮겼으며

sentences.original_text: Nebuzaradan commander of the imperial guard
the people who remained in the city
along with those who had gone over to him
and the rest of the people
